glosses: to matter, to be important, to make a difference

examples.text: Pepsi yok, kola var. Fark eder mi?
examples.translation: There is no Pepsi, but there is Coke. Does it matter?

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish فرق ایتمك (fark etmek). By surface analysis, fark (“difference”) + etmek (“to make”).
